item.title: PicoCTF_2023
item.description: Binary Exploitation tic-tac Someone created a program to read text files; we think the program reads files with root privileges but apparently it only accepts to read files that are owned by the user running it. ssh to saturn.picoctf.net:62983, and run the binary named “txtreader” once connected. Login as ctf-player with the password, d137d16e Upon ssh into machine, we see txtreader binary and flag.txt file, however we don’t have permissions to read them.
